item.title: JBLU
item.description: score:120 Chances: A rising economic situation, a moderation in the rate of inflation, and the prospect of lower interest rates later this year have a positive effect on the average consumer, leading to potential gains for airline carriers. JetBlue stock was upgraded to Buy from Hold by Deutsche Bank, which also raised its price target on the airlineâ€™s shares to $9.
